inclusion.criterion: able to perform spirometry and FOT tests
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: normal spirometry results (FEV1 & FEV1/FVC >80% and FEF25-75>65%)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: chronic lung disease other than asthma
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe chronic medical condition such as heart failure, neuromuscular disease etc.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
